description: vol. 1 (ṭahārah - bāb furūḍ al-ṣalāh). ff. 211. 242 x 185; 178 x 125 mm. 25 lin. Shaʻbān 739, ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Nāhiḍ al-ḥalabī. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 485 (commentary 5); S I, 670. Incip.: ... الحمد لله ... اما بعد فان العلم من اشرف ما ىطلب
author: Ibn al-Rifʻah, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, 1247 or 8-1310 or 11.
title: Kifāyat al-nabīh fī sharḥ al-Tanbīh.
creator: Ibn al-Rifʻah, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, 1247 or 8-1310 or 11.
subject: Fīrūzābādī al-Shīrāzī, Abū Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf, ca. 1003-1083—Tanbīh fī al-fiqh
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
